item.title: All my quick hacks/tips/tricks collected in one place
item.description: Using linux systems over the years has left me with a relatively big pile of useful commands to do stuff on the command line, editor, interpreters, you name it. The list updates dynamically over time as I add fix more stuff so make sure to visit it once in while. Suggestions welcome here: #indienews

item.title: The Many Uses of Schedulers
item.description: Let’s say you don’t have unlimited resources. Be it RAM, access to files, CPU slots, whatever you can think of. And then you have multiple workloads that will need said resources.

item.title: NeXT Glasses
item.description: Selecting appropriate wear for your next major contract kill There are also masks and stuff: http://jfreyboutiquetokyo.blog.fc2.com/blog-entry-3024.html

item.title: Risk of Trouble
item.description: Full disclosure: This game is amazing, you should try it. It’s probably on discount on GOG. BUT this is getting out of hand. I was just about to stop playing and then the game unlocked this ninja sword guy and I had to play it all over again. Let’s give it a month and we’ll revisit.

item.title: Hi
item.description: Hi there! I’ll be posting a bunch of stuff here I’m interested in. I built it using the awesome Hugo generator with a slightly modded Even theme. Let’s see how long this one lasts.
